THIS Institution will be opened on Monday


the 22d. of October Inst, under the care


of the Rev. JosErH WILSON.


In this Seminary students will be thoroughly IN
structed in the different branches of good English
and Classical Educaion viz: Reading, Wrlllng
Arithmetic, English Grammar, Geography, Compo,
son. Elocution, Mathematics, and the Greek ana
latin Languages. The terms of tuition will for
the English branches, exclusive of Mathematics,
S8 per session, or $40, including the Mathematics
for the Languages, including the English, Sio per
session. Tuition money to be paid in advance.
There will be two sessions in the year, with a
short vacation between each.


Good boarding can be obtained in respectable
famies in the village at the rate Of Forty Dollars
per session and few hparders can be accommo-
dated in the family Of the Principal.
JOHN EDDOWES. Sec'y.

full articles.headline:
.WiddIeto,U,s eAca(Icmy.
CLASSICAL nEYART TzNENY.
full articles.article:
THIS Institution will be opened on Monday


the 22d. of October Inst, under the care


of the Rev. JosErH WILSON.


In this Seminary students will be thoroughly IN
structed in the different branches of good English
and Classical Educaion viz: Reading, Wrlllng
Arithmetic, English Grammar, Geography, Compo,
son. Elocution, Mathematics, and the Greek ana
latin Languages. The terms of tuition will for
the English branches, exclusive of Mathematics,
S8 per session, or $40, including the Mathematics
for the Languages, including the English, Sio per
session. Tuition money to be paid in advance.
There will be two sessions in the year, with a
short vacation between each.


Good boarding can be obtained in respectable
famies in the village at the rate Of Forty Dollars
per session and few hparders can be accommo-
dated in the family Of the Principal.
JOHN EDDOWES. Sec'y.
